name: Aggieland Mariachi
description:
Mariachi Anillos de Oro was founded in the Fall of 2002 by students of Texas A&M University.  Since then, we have had many members participate in the group that have contributed to the popularity of Mariachi Anillos de Oro also known as the Aggieland Mariachi.  

Our goal is to expand from the Texas A&M campus and spread our name to the surrounding area of College Station and Bryan, Texas.  We hope that Aggieland Mariachi will be considered among the many traditions associated with Texas A&M University.

With the help from Alumni, we have been able to purchase new uniforms and instruments in order to help spread the beautiful tradition of mariachi music at the collegiate level. 

Fill out the form below for bookings!
http://goo.gl/forms/sn59AHVqpC
summary: This organization shall strive to serve, promote and make an impact in the community by enriching the environment with the Hispanic Heritage of a traditional mariachi ensemble....
